markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Djinni Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2598) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 115 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The magic of djinn runs through your blood. You can cast [_gust of wind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=143) and [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) once per day each as 2nd-level arcane innate spells.
name: Djinni Magic
